mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, a.* FROM ( SELECT post_num, post_parent, post_title, post_content, post_date, imageFileName, user_id, board_num FROM post ORDER BY post_date desc ) a ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{displayPost} AND #{postnum} ORDER BY rnum asc
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT post_num, post_parent, post_title, post_content, post_date, imageFileName, user_id, board_num FROM post ORDER BY post_date desc ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
mapper.insert: INSERT into post(post_num, post_title, post_content, imageFileName, user_id, post_date, post_parent, board_num) VALUES(#{post_num},#{post_title}, #{post_content}, #{imageFileName}, #{user_id}, SYSDATE, 0, 0)

SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(POST_NUM)+1 IS NOT NULL THEN MAX(POST_NUM)+1 ELSE 1 end as post_num FROM post
INSERT INTO post(post_num, post_title, post_content, imageFileName, user_id, post_date, post_parent, board_num) VALUES(#{post_num}, #{post_title}, #{post_content}, #{imageFileName}, #{user_id}, SYSDATE, #{post_parent}, 0)
mapper.delete: delete from post where post_num in ( SELECT post_num FROM post START WITH post_num = #{post_num} CONNECT BY PRIOR post_num = post_parent )
